snippet: With the start of the school year, we usher in a new season of Poetry Pairings. Here is our first one: Marilyn Taylor's "Subject to Change" matched with photographs by the teacher Will Okun.
abstract: With the start of the school year, we usher in a new season of Poetry Pairings. Here is our first one: Marilyn Taylor's "Subject to Change" matched with photographs by the teacher Will Okun.

headline.main: News and Verse: Our Weekly Poetry Pairings
